content: > this project is a showstopper > featuring a beautiful diamond trellis > pattern that s brought to life in a > pristine shade of yarn it looks like > an advanced project but is a simple > 8-row repeat that keeps you > entertained as you crochet with well > over 100 available shades to inspire > red heart super saver lets you > customize this project to perfectly > complement any space it s a great > gift for yourself or a friend
